item.title: Show HN：我为Google时间轴构建了一个替代品
item.description:
大家好，我想向您展示我在过去一年半左右构建的应用程序。它叫做Dawarich，它是一个免费的开源自托管Web应用程序，旨在替换Google时间表。 And it did for me and couple of hundreds of self-hosters.Recently my partner and I also launched a subscription-based cloud version, so those who don't have time or not interested in self-hosting could use it too.So, what Dawarich can do for you?- It visualized your movements- You can track your movements with our iOS app (I partnered up with a friend to make it happen) or one of 3rd party mobile apps, both for iOS and Android: GPSLogger, OwnTracks, Overland- It supports import of your existing data: from Google Takeout, GPX and GeoJSON data formats- It has some nice map layers, such as fog of war, heatmap and photos layer (that is if you have configured Immich/Photoprism integration)- It provides you with some stats to see distances traveled, split by month or年 - 它具有旅行功能，您可以在其中添加笔记，看看自己去过哪里，旅行了多长时间以及图片（如果您与Immich/Photoprism进行了集成，我个人从第1天开始使用它来替代Google时间轴，并且从未回顾过。仍然可以实施很多事情，以使Geodata产生更多的见解和旅行模式，但是它已经很有用，而且我每天都在努力使其更稳定且功能丰富。希望您也会发现它也有用：） Cheers！
注释url： https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=446669851 点：2 ＃评论：0
